channel.title: Can some one tell me

item.title: Can some one tell me
item.dc:creator: @ChillScape ChillScape!
item.description:
@ChillScape wrote:

Ok when i try to add what players will first start off with it shows in inve for like 3 seconds but like that items keeep coming then they go down one by one but fast… yea can any one help plz this is my code soo far…
